body:
I decided to make a community event for players to play walls! 

This will take place between Monday through Sunday around 9:00 PST AM to 7;00 PST PM,The times will be set so I am available to set the maps. It won't be for all 10 hours though :c

I'll bump this thread up 30 minutes before the event starts every time so don't miss out ;)

We'll also be on plug.dj so get your disco shoes on!

http://plug.dj/avicus

Hope to see you there!
